articles.description: Jos Buttler, the sure-shot starter for Rajasthan Royals is one of those prominent names who is set to leave India ahead of the world cup. Here's who is expected to replace him in the RR set-up.
articles.content:
Buttler has left RR camp due to his national duties (AP Photo)

articles.title: Orange Cap, Purple Cap IPL 2024: Top Players List After DC vs LSG Match - The Quint
articles.description: Orange Cap, Purple Cap Holders in IPL 2024: After DC beat LSG by 19 runs, Mukesh Kumar made it to the top 5 in best wicket takers list.
